code: import{Fragment}from"react";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import Admin from"./admin";import Personal from"./personal";import Manager from"./manager";import{select_route}from"./api";import{personal_sidebar}from"./api";import{admin_sidebar}from"./api";import{manager_sidebar}from"./api";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Backend=function Backend(_ref){var access=_ref.access;var _useParams=useParams(),page=_useParams.page;var _useParams2=useParams(),article_page=_useParams2.article_page;var token=window.sessionStorage.getItem('token');var permession=window.sessionStorage.getItem('permession');var navigate=useNavigate();function select_permession(){if(token){if(permession==="admin"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Admin,{});}else if(permession==="manager"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Manager,{});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Personal,{});}}}useEffect(function(){if(page==="登出"){window.sessionStorage.clear();navigate('/');}else if(admin_sidebar().indexOf(page)===-1&&personal_sidebar.indexOf(page)===-1){navigate('/access====>error');}console.log("page",page,"article_page",article_page);if(!token){navigate("/");}if(access!==permession){navigate('/access====>error');}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:select_permession()});};export default Backend;
